name: toot
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make a short sound or series of short sounds, especially with the horn of a car as a warning: The driver tooted (her horn). The train toots its whistle as it passes by. Synonyms
beep
honk (SOUND)Compare
blare verb
More examplesFewer examplesEveryone in the stadium is shouting and tooting horns.One demonstrator banged a plastic bucket like a drum, while another tooted a trumpet. Horns toot and sound systems blare as 2,000 bicyclists take to the streets.

a short sound, especially one that is one of a series of sounds made with the horn of a car: The waiting taxi gave a toot on its horn. The sharp toot of a car horn outside attracted her attention.
More examplesFewer examplesGive them a toot on the horn.You'll hear the toot of the horn as the mail bus goes by.He decided to let out a little toot on his whistle.
